feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
